short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customizable timer for any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of getting lost in the endless spiral of web browsing? Browsing Buffer is here to help you regain control of your time and focus on what truly matters. Browsing Buffer is a Chrome extension that allows you to set buffer timers for specific websites, making you wait and think before starting your next social scroll. Browsing Buffer encourages mindful browsing and helps to prevent time-wasting binges.
